@DPooch - If you check wikipedia for final act, the dubbing hasn't started yet. They only started casting the voice dub team.

Half a brain and 5 seconds worth of google searching and you guys would know that The Final Act hasn't BEEN dubbed yet, and so clearly it's not going to be available in anything other than Japanese audio.

Also, anybody who's having troubles with the audio, you're an idiot. Upgrade player/codecs, and try again. You people really should know these simple things if you're actually going to bother downloading a torrent in the first place, it's not that difficult...
